title.narrative: Leadership and Advocacy Skill Development Training

description.narrative: Leadership skills training is provided to community leaders to assist them in attaining positions on public bodies, and to advocate on behalf of their communities to secure entitlements and rights. This capacity building element of the project help beneficiaries secure a sense of ownership over gains made, as well as ensuring long-term sustainability to ensure ex-Kamaiya rights continue to be met after project
